price: Wawe wameegemea matandiko yenye bit'ana ya hariri nzito; na matunda ya Bustani hizo yapo karibu.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin wajanā al-janatayni dānin
